data.text:
Just returned from four nights here where I paid to upgrade to a Superior room. Upon check in was assigned to room 401, which had a very bad wifi signal (was getting about 2 bars of signal and a "weak connection" notice on my devices). I brought this up to the front desk shortly after I arrived and then again the following morning - they shared the hotel was booked to capacity and the wifi is being used by many guests (which is not a good excuse - budget hotels and hotels with 1,000+ rooms have good wifi). Anyway, after some back and forth, they moved me to Room 403 and the wifi worked perfectly for the rest of my stay. Thank you to the staff that helped facilitate that.

Location is good - right around the corner from the Arc de Triomf in the heart of El Born. Very good size room, housekeeping came daily, a bit of noise but that is to be expected when facing a street in the old city, breakfast was very tasty, there was a mini bar and snacks.

Few other minor flaws are the pool was closed (did not get notification before and when I went up to the roof to see if it was possible to at least sit up there, it was all closed off with caution tape). The hotel had the AC turned off even though Spring has started and temperatures were around 21C/70F. Also, for this type of hotel, Catalonia should have Nespresso machines in, which is common in nicer hotels like NH Hotels (they have a kettle in room and powder to make coffee, which is just not great quality).
data.title: Few issues but overall nice

data.text: Catalonia Born is in the Born District or Barcelona, a few steps from the Arc d'Triomphe. The room was spacious and quiet; hotel staff were friendly and helpful. It would have been nice if the website or communications had mentioned that the pool was closed but otherwise it was a good stay.
data.title: Good Location in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear wsw23, 

Thank you so much for your comments and valoration, we hope to see you again!

Best regards,
Catalonia Born
owner_response.author: CATALONIA BORN

data.text:
We have recently returned from 4 days at the Catalonia Born .
We chose this hotel based on the good reviews , but also for the hotel being in a quiet location but still near to all the wonderful places to visit . 
We chose to start our day with a choice from the plentiful cold buffet breakfast each morning which was beautifully set out with so much to choose from and there was also then a hot breakfast that they would cook to order if required .
Giulia who ran the breakfast restaurant was excellent . She was so helpful, worked incredibly hard and always had a smile on her face .
We stayed in a superior room with comfortable  beds and a large bathroom with a bath and a separate large shower .
What made our stay so wonderful was the friendliness and helpfulness of all the staff . 
Special thanks to Guillem  and Rachel on reception who went out of their way to help us with any query that we had and they booked a local restaurant for us on our last night .
We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona which we loved , but it is the staff that were the icing on the cake . Thank you Guillem , Rachel and Guilia üëèüëè
data.title: Hotel Catalonia Born - wonderful üòä

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear maryhT8,

Thank you so much for your time to rate us your comments help us to improve day by day, thank you also for highlight our staff specially about Guillem, Rachel and Giulia. We are really glad that you enjoyed the stay with us and we look forward to see you again very soon!

Kind regards
owner_response.author: CATALONIA BORN

data.text: Great place in Barcelona, very comfortable rooms for an acceptable price, extensive breakfast buffet, roof terrace friendly personnel. The hotel is near the metro and at the doorstep of the nice neighborhood Born, with its of nice little shops and restaurants. Close to the Cathedral and next to Arc de Triomphe.
data.title: Excellent stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kees J,

We are very happy that you enjoyed a pleasant stay with us in Barcelona and that you will keep us in mind for future plans, we hope to see you again very soon.

Best regards
owner_response.author: CATALONIA BORN

data.text: Fabulous hotel tucked down a side street near Arc de triomf‚Ä¶close to metro stations, bus stops that take you a short distance to all the sights. Spacious room and bathroom, very clean and comfortable, friendly reception staff. Great place to stay
data.title: Fabulous hotel
